page.title: 17Lucy's Day At The Show
page.content: Before we leave our stables for Withybush Airfield there is a lot of preparation _ we have to clean the tack and groom the horses and ponies; on the first day we look at the schedule for the whole week; we then load the horses into the horse_boxes and the day has begun..... {0000000 TALLY HO ! 0000000 Upon showing our SPECIAL PASS when we arrive at the Show we are given a parking space where we unload the horses; we then go to the EVENTS BOX where we are entered for COMPETITIONS. Last year{SHOW_JUMPING }was placed first, then {DRESSAGE }and for younger children {MOUNTED GAMES }next, e.g. {Musical Sacks,Egg and Spoon and Relay. We had to {SHOW our HORSES}as at SALE. {THE MOST OBEDIENT & BEST BEHAVED HORSE WON!! OH!! PERFECT DAY!!
